00038 #ifndef _PLT_TASKMANAGER_H_
00039 #define _PLT_TASKMANAGER_H_
00040 
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 #include "Neptune.h"
00045 
00046 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 |   forward declarations
00048 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 class PLT_ThreadTask;
00050 
00051 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 |   PLT_TaskManager class
00053 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 class PLT_TaskManager
00060 {
00061 public:
00068     PLT_TaskManager(NPT_Cardinal max_items = 0);
00069     virtual ~PLT_TaskManager();
00070 
00078     virtual NPT_Result StartTask(PLT_ThreadTask*   task, 
00079                                  NPT_TimeInterval* delay = NULL,
00080                                  bool              auto_destroy = true);
00081 
00085     NPT_Result StopAllTasks();
00086 
00087 private:
00088     friend class PLT_ThreadTask;
00089 
00090     // called by PLT_ThreadTask
00091     NPT_Result AddTask(PLT_ThreadTask* task);
00092     NPT_Result RemoveTask(PLT_ThreadTask* task);
00093 
00094 private:
00095     NPT_List<PLT_ThreadTask*>  m_Tasks;
00096     NPT_Mutex                  m_TasksLock;
00097     NPT_Mutex                  m_CallbackLock;
00098     NPT_Queue<int>*            m_Queue;
00099     NPT_Cardinal               m_MaxTasks;
00100     NPT_Cardinal               m_RunningTasks;
00101 };
